episode_event_valentine_2026_ch0284_41_s:
Adaman called [Name:PlayerNickname ],
asking to meet up to talk.

When [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived
at the meeting spot, Adaman was already
there.
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You came.

I was starting to wonder how long I’ve
been here.

There’s so much I want to say to you...
But first, I’d like you to have this.
It’s a bouquet, as a token of my gratitude!
Thank you, Adaman!
You like it! That’s a relief.
All my work on it paid off!
It’s gorgeous!

Thanks! I used the most lavish flowers I
could find.

All to see that surprised look on your face,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

This Palentine’s Day, I’ve already thanked
lots of friends...

and I wanted to make sure I gave you a
proper thanks, too.

I decided on a bouquet after talking to Mai
and Arezu. Seems it was a good choice!
Anyhow... It’s gotten pretty dark out, huh.

I was feeling kind of antsy waiting around,
wondering if you’d like my gift.

But this nighttime view... It honestly isn’t
half bad.

I guess some things that take time are worth
waiting for.

I feel like whenever I’m with you, I discover
new things, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Heheh! I look forward to spending more
time with you!
